about.me.title: Hi! I‚Äôm Dani Lucaci üëãüèª
about.me.subtitle: I‚Äôm a product designer and developer that is passionate about creating user-centered digital experiences. I specialize in UX/UI Design and front-end development, focusing on turning ideas and visions into practical and elegant solutions.
about.me.what.i.do.title: What I do
about.me.what.i.do.copy.1: As a designer and developer, I strive to create digital experiences that are based on the understanding of the pain points and needs of their users to create products that have a strong focus on accessibility, performance and user interaction.
about.me.what.i.do.copy.2: I enjoy translating my design solutions into responsive, interactive experiences in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript with clean and semantic code to develop modern websites and apps using the latest front-end techniques and tools.
about.me.what.i.do.copy.3: I‚Äôm always looking for new challenges and opportunities that can help me continue to become a better designer, developer, and person overall. I have a passion for self-learning and improving each day to challenge my skills and to become better at what I do.
about.me.what.i.do.copy.4: I am currently looking for new projects ‚Äîboth on-site and remotely‚Äî to continue learning and improving my skills as a designer and developer.

index.h1: Hi! I‚Äôm Dani Lucaci, Product Designer and Front-End Developer.
index.subtitle: I‚Äôm a designer and developer that is passionate about creating user-centered digital experiences. I specialize in UX/UI Design and front-end development, focusing on turning ideas and visions into practical and elegant solutions.
index.services.heading: What I do
index.services.1.title: UX Design
index.services.1.svg.alt: Illustration of the UX Design service offered by Dani lucaci.
index.services.1.copy: From early discovery to product evaluation, I use a variety of UX design methods to  ideate, design and validate practical and elegant solutions to design challenges.
index.services.2.title: UI Design
index.services.2.svg.alt: Illustration of the UI Design service offered by Dani lucaci.
index.services.2.copy: I design detail-oriented, pixel-perfect visual interfaces based on the latest design patterns and trends. My main tools of choice are Sketch or Figma, but I can also adapt to work with your team‚Äôs preferred tools.
index.services.3.title: Interaction Design
index.services.3.svg.alt: Illustration of the Interaction Design service offered by Dani lucaci.
index.services.3.copy: From paper sketches to high fidelity prototypes, I design and build prototypes to test and evaluate user interfaces and design solutions.
index.services.4.title: Front-End Development
index.services.4.svg.alt: Illustration of the Front-End Development service offered by Dani lucaci.
index.services.4.copy: I develop modern websites and apps using the latest front-end techniques and tools. I believe that all products should be built with a strong focus on accessibility, performance and user interaction.
